description: ABS/ESC ECU executing brake control logic and communicating over CAN.
Engine ECU exchanging torque and speed messages with the ABS ECU via powertrain CAN.
Electric Parking Brake ECU controlling actuator motors and monitoring EPB status.
Front-left wheel speed sensor providing wheel speed to ABS ECU.
Front-right wheel speed sensor providing wheel speed to ABS ECU.
Rear-left wheel speed sensor providing wheel speed to ABS ECU.
Rear-right wheel speed sensor providing wheel speed to ABS ECU.
Powertrain CAN network used for real-time exchange between ABS ECU, Engine ECU and EPB ECU.
Diagnostic CAN bus accessible via the OBD-II port for service and flashing.
Off-board diagnostic tester capable of UDS diagnostics and ECU flashing.
Brake pedal sensor signals (travel and force) representing driver brake request.
location: Harness between pedal sensors and ABS ECU

description: Wheel speed signals from all four wheel speed sensors as seen at the ABS ECU inputs.
Hydraulic valve command signals from ABS ECU to HCU valves for all wheels.
location: Harness between ABS ECU and Hydraulic Control Unit

description: Hydraulic pump command signal from ABS ECU to the HCU pump driver.
location: Harness between ABS ECU and HCU

description: 12V power supply rail feeding ABS ECU, wheel speed sensors and HCU.
location: Battery and vehicle power distribution network
